channel.title: How do you make infinite spec command
channel.description: hey, on my server i wanted to make an infinite special command and make it only for admins...can anyone help me with that?

item.title: How do you make infinite spec command
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Just use an if statement for that specific item to not remove special…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make infinite spec command

item.title: How do you make infinite spec command
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“diggy, post:4, topic:424024”][quote author=SheaTheDude link=topic=526674.msg3836838#msg3836838 date=1322959044]
hey, on my server i wanted to make an infinite special command and make it only for admins…can anyone help me with that?
[/quote]
If you’re talking PI

if (playerCommand.startsWith("infspec")) { c.specAmount = 99999.0;

Change the c.specAmount to whatever it is for your server. and add unter public void administratorCommands[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("infspec")) { c.specAmount = 99999.0; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make infinite spec command

item.title: How do you make infinite spec command
item.dc:creator: @diggy diggy
item.description:
@diggy wrote:

SheaTheDude:

hey, on my server i wanted to make an infinite special command and make it only for admins…can anyone help me with that?

If you’re talking PI

if (playerCommand.startsWith("infspec")) { c.specAmount = 99999.0; }

Change the c.specAmount to whatever it is for your server. and add unter public void administratorCommands

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make infinite spec command

item.title: How do you make infinite spec command
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:424024”]Infinite would be impossible
but u can just change it in your characterfiles, 100 to 99999 or something,
or make so they can do a command to refill the spec bar,
I bet I saw a tut on that[/quote]

infinte isnt impossible, u coudlt make that if the spec is down to 5000 its refills to 999999 againt, and if then goes down to 5000 it goes to 999999 again

so thats infinite

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make infinite spec command
